name: zip_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool us_zip_code_lookup.
Tool description: Find city, county, state, FIPS code, Time Zone and other information from a US Zip code.
API description: Retrieves income-related data for a given US ZIP code using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

zip.description: The ZIP code for which to retrieve income-related data.
